programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Patikoimassa ollut metsanvartija sattuu samalle polulle puuman kanssa. Vihainen supikoira hyokkaa koiranulkoiluttajan paalle Vancouverissa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 6/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Kausi 3, osa 13. Pete Nelson tiimeineen rakentaa toinen toistaan uskomattomampia puumajoja ihmisille, jotka haluavat kosketuksiin luonnon kanssa. (Treehouse Masters, tosi-tv, USA, 2014)

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: ! Kausi 1, osa 1. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n elainlaakarit hoitavat huskyn niskassa olevaa syvaa haavaa. Kaksi koiraa pelastetaan hylatylta takapihalta, jonne ne oli jatetty myrskyn jalkoihin ilman suojaa.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n virkailijat epailevat, etta eras mies kasvattaa koiranpentuja kellarikerroksessa Philadelphiassa. Olosuhteet ovat ala-arvoiset, ja tiimi aikoo lopettaa touhun.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat tutkivat uutta teoriaa Skotlannin Loch Nessin hirviosta. Olento voi olla paitsi todellinen, myos mahdollisesti vaarallisempi kuin on edes kuviteltu.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Patikoimassa ollut metsanvartija sattuu samalle polulle puuman kanssa. Vihainen supikoira hyokkaa koiranulkoiluttajan paalle Vancouverissa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Heti kun Dexter tuli taloon, se yritti tappaa Daisyn. Corey hankki Giver-kissan Sarahille syntymapaivalahjaksi, mutta nyt han haluaisi palauttaa sen.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Nuori lumileopardi ei pysty kavelemaan kunnolla ja uhkaa jaada pysyvasti liikuntavammaiseksi. Elaintarhanhoitajat rakentavat uutta aitausta gaselleille.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Kesan kunniaksi tiimi jarjestaa autonpesutempauksen, jolla kerataan varoja lehmille ja aaseille. Dan lahtee peiteoperaatioon loukkaantunutta vuohta pelastamaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi matkustavat syrjaiselle paikkakunnalle pitamaan maksutonta vastaanottoa. Elainlaakari Petra pelastaa hataleikkauksella auton alle jaaneen bassetin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: San Francisco Giants haluaa siirtaa palasen McCovey Coven satama-aluetta pelikentalle. Osaavatko pojat rakentaa akvaarion, joka on tarpeeksi iso hammastyttaakseen uskolliset fanit?

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA haluaa oikeutta auttamilleen elaimille. Silla on eri puolilla osavaltiota yhdeksan agenttia, jotka hoitavat kaikkea kissoista ja koirista hevosiin, matelijoihin ja karhuihin.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA haluaa oikeutta auttamilleen elaimille. Silla on eri puolilla osavaltiota yhdeksan agenttia, jotka hoitavat kaikkea kissoista ja koirista hevosiin, matelijoihin ja karhuihin.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 11/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, lifestyle, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mosambikista hengenvaarallista "paholaisenkukan" rukoilijasirkkaa. Terien ja koukkujen peittama hyonteinen on lahes huomaamaton, silla se nayttaa trooppiselta kukalta.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, jakso 20. Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat minimonstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan. (Little Giants, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Hyppaa Pete Nelsonin kanssa kulissien taakse ja nae hanen ennen esittamattomia Treehouse Masters -lempihetkia. Mukana on myos paljon kadonnutta kuvamateriaalia.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia, Tania ja Mariah muistelevat kaikkein hellyttavimpia hetkia. Matkalla on ollut yllattavia pelastusoperaatioita, liikuttavia jalleennakemisia ja sydanta lammittavia adoptioita.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy yrittaa auttaa perheita saamaan kurittomat lemmikkinsa aisoihin naiden vammautettua omistajiaan tai pilattua heidan ihmissuhteitaan.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 11/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, lifestyle, USA, 2019)

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Jouluna kavelylla olleet isa ja tyttaret joutuvat kengurun hyokkayksen kohteeksi. Leijona vetaa naisen jalat kaltereiden toiselle puolelle elainten suojelukeskuksessa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Hengenvaarallisesti loukkaantunut Jabu-norsu on maailman ensimmainen norsu, jolle Derrick Campana asentaa jalkatuen, jonka toivotaan pelastavan elaimen hengen.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 12. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 5/9. Bronxin elaintarha -sarjan tekijoiden uudessa uskomattomassa elainsarjassa katsojat viedaan lantisen pallonpuoliskon suurimman akvaariokonaisuuden kulissien taaksen Yhdysvaltojen Atlantaan. (The Aquarium, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Vapaaehtoiset elaintensuojelijat Kansasista tuovat hoitoon pienen koiran. Elainlaakari Jeffin serkku pyytaa tiimia tuomaan Tennesseehen maksutonta palvelua.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Koripallolegenda Dwight Howard pyytaa ATM:n poikia suunnittelemaan ja rakentamaan terraarion 14:lle kaarmeelle. Han haluaa lisaksi liskolinnan!

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n virkailijat epailevat, etta eras mies kasvattaa koiranpentuja kellarikerroksessa Philadelphiassa. Olosuhteet ovat ala-arvoiset, ja tiimi aikoo lopettaa touhun.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Pennsylvanian SPCA-virkailijat vastaavat hylattyja elaimia koskevaan kutsuun, mutta mikaan ei valmista heita siihen, mita keittion jaakaapista loytyy!

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt palaavat Alaskaan ja loytavat oman tilansa taysin ransistyneessa kunnossa. Alkaa kiireinen terasraitiovaunun rakentaminen ennen roudan saapumista.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: In Hunt County, wardens investigate rumours of wolves being kept as pets. Plus, turtles are released back into the sea and there are reports of donkeys being shot.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete ottaa vastaan tyon parilta, joka etsii puumajojen aatelista. Riippusillan ja salakammion ansiosta tama piilopaikka sopisi jopa Mustaparralle.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Kurkistamme hain kitaan kameroiden kuvatessa merten pelottavinta saalistajaa ulkoa ja sisalta. Naemme tarkkaan, millaista on olla hain toiminnan keskiossa`.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt palaavat Alaskaan ja loytavat oman tilansa taysin ransistyneessa kunnossa. Alkaa kiireinen terasraitiovaunun rakentaminen ennen roudan saapumista.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Maratonia juossut nainen jaa karhuemon ja poikasen valimaastoon. Puuma hyokkaa oljyputken parissa tyoskennelleen miehen paalle.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mongoliasta taimenta eli lohikalojen suurinta ja petomaisinta edustajaa. Perille paasy vaatii kuitenkin navigointia vaarallisissa olosuhteissa.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete ottaa vastaan tyon parilta, joka etsii puumajojen aatelista. Riippusillan ja salakammion ansiosta tama piilopaikka sopisi jopa Mustaparralle.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n virkailijat epailevat, etta eras mies kasvattaa koiranpentuja kellarikerroksessa Philadelphiassa. Olosuhteet ovat ala-arvoiset, ja tiimi aikoo lopettaa touhun.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Pennsylvanian SPCA-virkailijat vastaavat hylattyja elaimia koskevaan kutsuun, mutta mikaan ei valmista heita siihen, mita keittion jaakaapista loytyy!

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: Anita, Ade, Ant and Dan discover hidden night-time operations and hard-nosed negotiations at their new base in the New Fulton Fish Market in The Bronx.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben returns to New Zealand to catch up with the Long family, who live a hunter-gatherer existence on the countrys South Island in an area that is two days hike from the nearest road. So how have the children coped with such an isolated upbringing, and how have the parents maintained their relationship?

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Dark winter quickly approaches in the Arctic, leaving residents of the last frontier to make a final push for needed provisions. In Eagle, Andy Bassich must secure clean water to grow vital crops. Sue Aikens stalks a herd of caribou to secure meat for the winter. The Hailstones split up to gather and hunt in Kiwalik, and Jessie Holmes returns to a familiar area to hunt a dangerous predator.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Eastern Europe to meet Brits Jordan, Lewis, and their children, who undertake the renovation of a dilapidated farmhouse in a Bulgarian village. With the countrys population on the decline, Ben is curious about their choice.

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Shocking new insights into the demise of modern humans sister species, the Neanderthals, Homo sapienss possible role in their downfall and how it became the last human species on Earth. 3/5

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: No rain, no life. Thats the basic rule of survival on earth. Drought occurs in almost all types of climates. Of all the meteorological phenomena that can cause serious economic consequences, droughts are second only to hurricanes, according to the National Climatic Data Center. 5/8

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: Anita, Ade, Ant and Dan discover hidden night-time operations and hard-nosed negotiations at their new base in the New Fulton Fish Market in The Bronx.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Starting from one of the worlds most remote cities, Walvis Bay, in Namibia, we roll 1,500 miles through the Kalahari desert to Pretoria, South Africas Executive Capital.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: While many of the new lives Ben dives into feel like a gritty struggle against the elements, Lucy and Tims relocation to New Zealand looks more like something from an aspirational blog or YouTube channel.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With summer nearing its end, Alaskans kick into high gear.

programme.title: Egyptian Tomb Hunting
programme.desc: Tony Robinson travels the length of the Nile, from Cairo to Aswan, to investigate tombs of all shapes and sizes, and meets the archaeologists, including John Ward, who are unearthing extraordinary wonders.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Jelly Bean Factory in Dublin to reveal the incredible processes it employs to make ten million colourful little sweets every day. Cherry Healey visits the University of Birmingham to learn about the important role glucose plays in our bodies, and she visits a lipstick factory to discover how one of the ingredients in jelly beans plays a key role in the production of her lippy. Historian Ruth Goodman is serving up the history of jelly and delves into the story of post-war picknmix.

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: Discover how something as flimsy as an envelope of gas - an atmosphere - can create some of the most wondrous sights in the solar system. Professor Brian Cox takes a flight to the top of earths atmosphere, where he sees the darkness of space above and the thin blue line of our atmosphere below. Against the stunning backdrop of the glaciers of Alaska, Brian reveals his fourth wonder: Saturns moon Titan, shrouded by a murky, thick atmosphere.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean
programme.desc: Our spies reveal the extraordinary relationships that exist among the creatures of the ocean. Spider crabs rise up from the abyss in their thousands to shed their protective shells, but as our Spy Crab soon discovers, this makes them an easy target for hunting stingrays. There is protection in numbers, however, and those still with armoured shells form a crustacean fortress that protects the vulnerable crabs inside. Spy Crab finds itself alone, unprotected, and an easy target for the rays. Sharks have a reputation for being solitary killers, but when Spy Hammerhead joins a huge gathering of hammerhead sharks, it discovers they can be surprisingly social. This mechanical marvel, propelled by its undulating tail, discovers why they meet together at a remote island off the coast of Colombia. Its a place where the laws of the food chain dont seem to apply. Here, they take a break from the rigours of the ocean and are groomed by king angel fish. When Galapagos sharks arrive, they are welcomed by pilot fish who swim close to their jaws, using the shark as their personal bodyguard. Rainbow chub have another type of relationship - they use the sharks serrated scales as an exfoliator to remove parasites. The fish may be dicing with death, but in this place of apparent harmony, none are ever eaten. Spy Moray Eel joins the gathering to explore the incredible hunting partnership between leather bass groupers and moray eels. The groupers find where the fish are hiding, while the eels flush them from their coral hideaways. Elsewhere, we discover that dolphins are more sociable than ever imagined, gathering more proof of their fun-loving nature. Spy Dolphin and Spy Pelican discover they dont just play among themselves; they also encourage whales to join their games. In incredible scenes, they leap playfully together, but in the end a whale is no match for a dolphin. In the Caribbean, Spy Manatee films the uneasy relationship manatees have with remora fish. These hangers-on hitch a ride on the manatees backs, feeding on parasites as well as their poo. The manatees also visit a spa staffed by sergeant major fish. The attention they receive sends them into a state of bliss, until rays and sharks appear. These predators cant resist taking an exploratory nibble from our spy. Of all the relationships found in the worlds oceans, few can beat the spinner dolphins. Off the coast of Costa Rica, a team of spy creatures find out how essential communication is when hunting. Their astonishing leaps are a signal to other dolphins, and they use their clicks and whistles to communicate at close range. In one of the most incredible sights ever seen, groups of spinner dolphins come together to form a megapod numbering thousands. As they set off to hunt, Spy Dolphin and Spy Frigate discover a surprising partnership between tuna and dolphins, one that takes them to a school of flying fish. The dolphins drive the flying fish from below, while the tuna pursue them in the air. On the pacific coast of North America, Spy Tuna Crab arrives just in time to witness another rarely seen spectacle. Tuna crabs, a type of squat lobster, rise to the surface in their millions to feed on the plankton that gather in these nutrient-rich waters. As storms build in the Caribbean, spiny lobsters prepare to migrate to calmer and warmer waters, using an ingenious way of traveling a lobster conga! Spy Lobster joins a procession of over 50 lobsters as they march in single file to deeper waters. There is safety in numbers, and before long, they go their own way as some find shelter in a shipwreck. Finally, our spies travel to the Galapagos to discover the rich community of sea creatures that live there. Marine iguanas huddle together on the volcanic rocks basking in the morning sun, ready to take on the day. Spy Iguana joins them as they leap into the ocean to search for food beneath the waves. Here our spy also encounters the wondrous mola mola, who arrive to be cleaned by angelfish and hogfish before they vanish back into the deep. Our spy has one last inhabitant to find - a colony of damselfish. They are meticulous gardeners who work together to maintain their lawns of algae, which they use to catch the eye of a mate. To succeed, they must dispatch any trespassers. The worst of all are sea urchins who can graze their lawns to the ground. To remove them requires skill and cooperation. It makes a fitting end to our spies ocean voyage. One that shows how sea life is interconnected in ways we could hardly imagine, an undersea world built on extraordinary relationships.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMWednesday 3 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Berlin to StuttgartSeason 7 Episode 3 of 10SSubtitlesThis time, Michael Portillo ventures on a rail journey through Germany, guided by Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide published in 1936. Starting in the vibrant city of Berlin, Michael visits the Museum of Modern Art in Berlins Kreuzberg, where he sees how a leading artist of the era, George Grosz, warned of the rise of fascism in a haunting self-portrait. In the Schoneberg district of the capital, Michael researches the decadent night scene of the 1920s, and looks at how cabaret culture is being revived today. When he reaches Weimar, Michael investigates the beginnings of Bauhaus design and visits the movements first building, before travelling onto Stuttgart, where he takes a ride in a high-performance Porsche to the manufacturers Stuttgart headquartersGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Wednesday 3 January. programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: This episode reveals how a planets size can mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean
programme.desc: Our spy creatures explore the challenges ocean life must overcome to survive. Spy Whale is joined by Spy Dolphin as they encounter a humpback whale calf in danger of drowning when competing males pursue its mother. After a remarkable effort from the calfs parent, she not only manages to protect her baby from danger, they also gain a bodyguard! On the island of South Georgia, a version of the first spy camera ever made makes a triumphant return. This new Bouldercam dodges eight tonnes of colliding blubber as male elephant seals fight off rivals. In the chaos, an elephant seal pup is separated from his mother, and his survival depends on finding her. Bouldercam is with him all the way as he fights off skuas and other dangers. Spy Crab meets the infamous peacock mantis shrimp and soon finds itself on the receiving end of the strongest punch in nature, a knockout blow faster than a speeding bullet. In the Galapagos, Spy Seal does its best to keep up with a lonesome sea lion as it chases tuna, one of the fastest fish in the ocean. Not only must he catch this enormous fish alone, he must do it while fighting off hungry sharks. In the hidden depths off the Californian coast, there are fish that have to be seen to be believed. Alien-like sarcastic fringehead use their outsized gaping mouths to ward off rivals. Spy Fringehead is soon caught in the brawl, but its open mouth reveals a camera, one that captures a fish-eyes view of the threat it faces. Off the coast of British Columbia, huge herring shoals face even greater trouble as they head to their spawning grounds. Spy Herring eavesdrops on the strange sounds produced by flatulent herring as they guide others to the spot. Our spy slips into the shoal as they attempt to dodge marauding sea lions and the diving scoter ducks that are after their eggs. Life on the beach isnt always the paradise its cracked up to be either. When hermit crabs gather to swap their shells, things can go very wrong, very quickly. When a crab loses its shell, it has to think on its feet. It comes up with an inventive solution the lid of some suntan lotion provides a temporary refuge from predatory birds. Our spies are not immune to trouble themselves. When Spy Pelican films the spectacular spawning of grunion fish as thousands emerge from the sea to spawn on the beach, it takes a catastrophic plunge into the surf, leaving Spy Crab to take over its filming duties. Spy Iguana is also in trouble when it tries to film iguanas gallantly battling the stormy sea. Despite its best efforts, it is soon washed away. When the same happens to Spy Octopus, all is not lost. Its rescued from the storm surges by its old friend, the coconut octopus. On their many adventures across the series, our spy creatures have travelled the globe to reveal the extraordinary intelligence, surprising emotions and complex social lives possessed by ocean life. On the way, they shed light on the mysteries of the deep as never before.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: The Train des Pignes explores France. Leaving chic 21st century Nice behind, the Train des Pignes, or the Pine Cone Train, takes viewers back to the Provence of the past. Cameras explore the village of Villars-sur-Var, where olive oil is made using the same stone-wheel technique the Templar Knights used 1,000 years ago. Narrated by Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Richard Osmanin pelitalon ilta
programme.desc: Kuuluisat kilpailijat testaavat tietouttaan erilaisissa viihdepeleissa. Sarjaan kuuluvat kaikki hauskat ja suosituimmat House of Games -sarjan haasteet seka uusia peleja ja tempauksia.

programme.desc: Would I Lie To You?

programme.desc: Graham Norton juontaa hauskan ohjelman, jossa keskustellaan vilkkaasti hanta itseaan eniten kiinnostavista ihmisista, trendeista ja tapahtumista.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Joukkuekapteeneina toimivat Rob Beckett ja Katherine Ryan, ja vieraina nahdaan koomikko Tom Allen, leivonta-ohjelman Liam Charles, TV-tahti Scarlett Moffatt ja koomikko Maisie Adam. Jimmy Carr juontaa.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig pohtii monenlaisia sekalasia aiheita, kuten miten pystyy erottamaan toisistaan snautserielimen ja nukaaliligamentin? Sandi tietaa vastaukset.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Juontaja Sandi Toksvig perehtyy vastakohtiin. Miten erotellaan lampaat vuohista, mika on Tarzanin vastakohta ja lisaksi teleskooppi, joka osoittaa suoraan maapallon lapi. Vieraina nahdaan Sara Pascoe, Colin Lane, Jimmy Carr ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: Antiikki Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce ja tyoryhma ovat BBC Cavershamin mailla lahella Readingia. Esineisiin kuuluvat mm. Wilfred Owenin omistama rippikirja ja vintage Aston Martin.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle
programme.desc: Ben tapaa Toscanassa brittipariskunta Georgen ja Sophien, jotka ovat puhaltaneet uutta elamaa maalaistaloon. Georgen haave omavaraisuudesta on johtanut elamanmittaiseen hankkeeseen.

programme.desc: Nyt on kaikkien aikojen ensimmainen Tudor-viikko! Ensin valmistetaan Tudor-klassikko, tekninen haaste on solmukas keksi, ja lopuksi tavoitellaan yltakyllaista Tudor-bankettia.

programme.desc: Kiinnostavia vastauksia etsiva tietokilpailu. Stephen Fry matematiikan parissa vierainaan Sandi Toksvig, Aisling Bea, Susan Calman ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Kiinnostavia vastauksia etsiva visailu. Stephen Fry kyselee avioliitosta ja pariutumisesta vierainaan Jo Brand, Greg Davies, Bill Bailey ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Nyt on kaikkien aikojen ensimmainen Tudor-viikko! Ensin valmistetaan Tudor-klassikko, tekninen haaste on solmukas keksi, ja lopuksi tavoitellaan yltakyllaista Tudor-bankettia.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Murhatunnustus askarruttaa rikoskomisario Richard Poolea. Koko tiimi on ymmallaan, kun vaimo myontaa tappaneensa miehensa, mutta ruumista ei loydy mistaan.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle
programme.desc: Ben matkaa Sambiaan asumaan brittiperheen luokse, joka on rakentanut safarimajan kansallispuiston laidalle. Ben saa kuulla, mika motivoi perhetta jatkamaan tulipalojen ja tulvien aiheuttamista vastoinkaymisista huolimatta.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Kiinnostavia vastauksia etsiva tietokilpailu. Stephen Fry matematiikan parissa vierainaan Sandi Toksvig, Aisling Bea, Susan Calman ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Kiinnostavia vastauksia etsiva visailu. Stephen Fry kyselee avioliitosta ja pariutumisesta vierainaan Jo Brand, Greg Davies, Bill Bailey ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Kiinnostavia vastauksia etsiva visailu. Stephen Fry tenttailee keskimmaisen QI-sarjan tietoutta vierainaan Aisling Bea, Danny Bhoy, Jimmy Carr ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: Antiikki Roadshow
programme.desc: Tyoryhma matkustaa Englannin jarvialueelle, missa Fiona Bruce ja asiantuntijat tapaavat satoja paikallisia, jotka tuovat ylpeina perhekalleuksiaan arvioitaviksi.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Semifinaalissa nelja ompelijaa tekevat epasymmetrisen hameen, muuttavat pussilakanan naisten vaatteeksi ja piirtavat sisaisen suunnittelijansa... Claudia Winkleman juontaa.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Kausi 7, 9/10. Valieriin asti selvinneet nelja leipuria joutuvat todelliseen tulikokeeseen, kun vuorossa on toinen toistaan teknisesti haastavampia ranskalaisia luomuksia. Ensin yritetaan muotoilla taydellisia palmier-kekseja, sitten kaydaan likoorilla kostutetun savarin-kakun kimppuun. Paahaasteessa huomio keskittyy fondant-massaan, jolla on tarkoitus koristella nayttavia kakkuja. Brittilaisessa leivontaohjelmassa innokkaat amatoorileipojat kisailevat toisiaan vastaan erilaisissa leivontahaasteissa.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kausi 1, 5/8. Vangin saattaminen Saint-Marien saarelle menee karmealla tavalla pieleen, kun lautalla tapahtuu rikos Richard Poolen silmien alla. Kuka lautalla olijoista on tekija? Noloon tilanteeseen joutunut Richard tekee kaikkensa selvittaakseen syyllisen. Brittilais-ranskalainen kuvitteelliselle Karibian saarelle sijoittuva komediallinen rikossarja.

programme.title: Suuri keramiikkakisa
programme.desc: Kymmenen savenvalannan harrastajaa kilpailee Britannian parhaan tittelista. Teknista osaamista testataan erikoistuomarina toimivan keramiikkasuunnittelija Emma Bridgewaterin silman alla.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Juontaja Sandi Toksvig perehtyy operaatioihin. Nyt selviaa, miten muffineista tehdaan vaarallinen ase. Vieraina nahdaan Bill Bailey, Katherine Ryan, Rhod Gilbert ja Alan Davies.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig juontaa QI-tietovisan joulujakson vierainaan Jason Mansford, Romesh Ranganathan, Holly Walsh ja Alan Davies. Miten paketoidaan oudon muotoinen lahja ja milla viinitahrat irtoavat matosta?

programme.title: Scandinavia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Skandinavian-matkansa viimeisella osuudella Simon matkustaa Ruotsin kauniiden havumetsien halki Koopenhaminaan eli Tanskan historialliseen paakaupunkiin.

programme.title: Maailman kauneimmat junareitit
programme.desc: Matka alkaa Namibian Walvis Baylta, maailman syrjaisimpiin kuuluvasta kaupungista, ja jatkuu 2 400 kilometrin matkan Kalaharin aavikon kautta Etela-Afrikan hallintopaakaupunkiin Pretoriaan.

programme.title: Elamaa aarirajoilla: Alaska
programme.desc: Alaskassa arki on yhta ponnistelua, ja yksikin vaara paatos voi koitua kohtalokkaaksi.

programme.title: Antiikki Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce esittelee aikaisempien jaksojen aarteita, joita ei ole viela naytetty televisiossa. Niihin kuuluu kiehtovia loytoja, kuten matkalaukullinen ensimmaisessa maailmansodassa vangiksi joutuneen sotilaan avaamattomia kirjeita.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Monien kovien ompeluhaasteiden jalkeen kolme finalistia taistelee Britannian parhaan kotiompelijan tittelista paitojen, pienten mustien mekkojen ja lattiaan ulottuvien iltapukujen avulla.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Kolme loppukilpailijaa saa kilpailun kaikkien aikojen vaikeimman loppuhaasteen, johon kuuluu samalla suurin maara vaadittuja leivonnaisia. Kuka kruunataan voittajaksi?

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kausi 1, 6/8. Kokenut sukeltaja hukkuu yhtakkia, mika herattaa epailykset murhasta. Kun Camille on Pariisissa ja Richard Poole sairasvuoteessa, Dwayne ja Fidel ryhtyvat ratkomaan tapausta. Pian avuksi saadaan sijainen, johon verrattuna jopa Richard on varsin rento kaveri. Brittilais-ranskalainen kuvitteelliselle Karibian saarelle sijoittuva komediallinen rikossarja.

programme.desc: Elaimilla on uskomattomia keinoja selviytya nopeasti muuttuvassa ihmisten maailmassa, aina talojen sisalla metsastavista kobrista makaki-apinoihin, jotka varastavat matkapuhelimia ja kayvat niilla vaihtokauppaa.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a forest song, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it. Does Lilit tell the truth or does she just carry on pretending to like it?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look. And now everyone is using their adorable power to get Mushpie to do what they want!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a "friends tree" mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with "laser" party favors and are propelled onto an "unknown planet": a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the babys parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to gold leaf the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that its his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game Floor is Lava. They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play for real!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie gets angry when David accidentally takes her winning turn in a playground game. Barney helps Vivie process her anger, so she can work through it and keep playing with her friends.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: While on an Enchanted Jungle trek, David loses the friends magical explorer mobile, after promising to remember where they parked it. Barney helps David learn its okay to make mistakes and the responsible thing to do is try to fix them.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxationand off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the babys parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzys liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quackers cousin, and penguin named Tux, makes life miserable for Tom and Jerry when he insists on trying to devour the fish in Ricks new aquarium.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A lost little lamb appears at Maudes farm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry take on the Johnny Appleseed story.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is mistakenly placed in a shelter for homeless animals and forced to join the shelters rock-n-roll while Jerry lives the life of Riley back home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang are determined to make Rick and Ginger change their mind about downsizing and moving to the big city by making it impossible to sell the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A lineage check determines that Spike is descended from British aristocracy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname "Tough Buff." But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerized mystery - and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-loeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where theyd hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzys TV. But it doesnt take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: its an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Rangers cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and its automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch gets muscled out of his alley by a bullying runt of an alley cat and Tom, Jerry and Spike team up to help Butch win back his territory (and keep him out of theirs).

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry help a runaway champion horse become competitive again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A magicians hat is left behind at Ginger and Ricks house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, a strange flying bug bites Tom, transforming him into a Tom-sized bug monster. Van Mouseling saves the village with an old-fashioned canister of bug poison, and Tom flies off to the abandoned castle on the hill. But Toms troubles arent over yet! Inside, he must deal with huge spider webs and a spider the size of a truck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady isrushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A milkman accidentally walks off with a maritime curio belonging to Bean _ who indignantly follows him to the bottling plant at the local dairy, determined to retrieve it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy the winner being the first to climb The Big One, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how its done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Daffy invites the crew to take a mud soak in his truck bed, and it turns out to be anything but relaxing.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Nonnas chronic ankle injury puts her annual Pizza Extravaganza at risk of not happening. Vivie discovers that with the help and care of their community, she and Nonna will be able to manage anything!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels in a bad mood, she has a hard time finding the "happy" in anything. Barneys magical scavenger hunt leads Mel to discover that searching for and focusing on things youre grateful for can make you feel better.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his TV snack by a strange flow of incongruous objects that have been transformed into hot-air balloons. When he sees the Lemmings onboard these curious zeppelins, Grizzy understands that he will quickly have to confiscate their helium tank and balloons if he wants to relax in front of the TV.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers with great delight that the ranger has purchased a brand new multifunction Stressless recliner. But even an armchair designed for well-being - the ultimate in relaxation - can used for other purposes by the Lemmings, who transform it into a fearsome multi-game chair.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. Its time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplishedand now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that theyve lost their lives purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the labs hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean discovers he has a doppelganger: Mr. Pod. They wear the same clothes and look exactly alike. Unfortunately, it all goes wrong when his girlfriend, Irma, thinks that Mr. Pod is much more handsome than Bean.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry accidentally ruin Spikes birthday party for Tyke, he forces them to take over. But no matter what they do at the puppy birthday bash, nothing seems to work out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
