programme.desc: Toodles hires Tom and Jerry to investigate and protect her against a threat to her tuna can inheritance, but a mysterious figure keeps trying to hurt them as they investigate.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland, until they realize they cant get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry causes Tom to lose eight out of his nine lives. Tom uses magic to bring them back, and instead is stuck with eight annoying ghost versions of himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy and Tyke head out on their own big adventure into the snowy mountains during a family vacation, Tom catches the blame from Spike and Jerry for letting them go. But when all three set out on a rescue mission for the little ones, its Tom, Jerry and Spike wholl need rescuing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Huldie sends Tom and Jerry into the woods to find a baby dragon whom they befriend on the way home; when Hildie tells them she plans on making a special baby dragon dinner, Tom and Jerry work together to save him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Spikes birthday and he has been counting the days down. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special, but not this one. He has forgotten! Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires -- but dont worry, it ends happily.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A mockingbird has taken roost in a tree outside Gingers window, where it sings the sweetest songs whenever shes around. When she leaves for work, however, the mockingbird earns its name by mocking Tom and Jerry relentlessly. When her nest full of eggs hatches and the insults really take flight, Tom, Jerry and even Spike, decide its time for these birds to fly the coop!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When the Witch Sisters are brewing up their latest concoction, they discover that their stash of walnuts has disappeared. Needless to say, Jerry is enjoying the "nuts" of his labor, while Tom is sent out to gather more nuts. When Tom steals the winters supply of nuts from a feisty flying squirrel, things go from bad to worse. Not only does the squirrel take Jerrys stash, but the irate rodent launches an attack on Tom inside the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese including waking up Tom!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Not wanting to miss a marathon of their favorite TV show, Butch and Meathead give Tom a fake treasure map in exchange for a little TV time. While they try to get comfortable in Rick and Gingers house, Tom and Jerry must figure out a way to circumvent Spike when they realize his house is sitting directly atop their riches.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, retrieving gifted items from Badwill is not easy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quackers sleepwalking habit creates mischief and mayhem for Tom and Jerry during an overnight sleepover.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quacker, Tuffy and others in the Dandy Do-Gooders club earn their badges with the help of their club leader, Jerry, who creates new ways of irritating Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been trapped with Tom its entire life, the shadow refuses to go back to the life it once had. But when the shadow becomes a total nuisance to Tom and Jerry, they team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While Rick and Ginger are looking after their adorable niece for the weekend, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the kid safe while Ginger goes to the store. Taking his new job seriously, Spike swears that nothing will happen to the baby. Naturally, this is where Tom and Jerry arrive on the scene to wreak havoc and make Spikes babysitting job quite possibly be his last!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesnt want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunias Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build hog.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesnt want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. / Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! The rest of the Batwheels must learn how to use their big new bodies to undo the wish!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just cant put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bams utility belt for a mission. / Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding ... until she tries it!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before -- touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep offers to look after the Golden Compost while Sushi-Mushi is away. But it smells so delicious that the Mushables will do anything to taste it. Its up to Chep to stop them!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle comes across something Mush-Mush has made, she declares him a genius artist! But Mush-Mush is not sure thats the kind of genius he wants to be.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone realizes that they dont actually know what Fung and Miffs special gifts are! So Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out without Fung and Miff knowing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort win her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzys liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabins interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzys cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzys discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he cant watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings arent interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea. Hell get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. One slight detail, the refrigerator shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, its an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases ones sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemmings natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santas magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks hes won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: A very bad parking choice on Freds part leads the gang to an asteroid mining base in outer space where an alien virus appears to be infecting the crew one by one, turning them into evil skull-headed aliens. The paranoid, terrified gang must try to solve the mystery before the virus reaches them, as well if it hasnt already!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om een sneeuwstorm te ontwijken checkt de groep in bij een eng enorm hotel wat geleid wordt door een man die erg strikt is over de regels die opgesteld zijn door zijn overleden moeder. De groep komt erachter dat de straf voor een overtreding uitgevoerd wordt door de geest van de overleden moeder zelf.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Nonnas chronic ankle injury puts her annual Pizza Extravaganza at risk of not happening. Vivie discovers that with the help and care of their community, she and Nonna will be able to manage anything!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Billys big, boisterous energy causes accidental destruction during the kids farm-play. Barney and the kids help him re-channel his exuberant strength more productively so they can all enjoy playing together.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark corner of the attic full of cobwebs, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is stuck in the lab with a dangerous robot on the loose! Its up to the combined effort of the two Docs and the entire Lab team to save him before it is too late.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.desc: The Lemmings hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzys cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzys discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he cant watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings arent interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into believing he is invisible.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tyke undergoes a personality change after watching too many cop shows on TV.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues. The only thing that ends it is the news that the kitten has a new home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Fed up with Toms cat hair, Rick buys the "Suck-Up," a next level Roomba-like cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans nonstop. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming machine turns on them both and takes over the house -- Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The storm of the century is brewing -- according to Tuffy and Jerry, that is, who are giving Tom a little payback for tormenting them earlier. Spike also gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy en Scooby ontdekken hun nieuwe lievelingseten wanneer de gang onderzoek doet naar het mysterie van een angstaanjagende voetballer die ronddwaalt in een snackfabriek!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish thats lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bears efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with "laser" party favors and are propelled onto an "unknown planet": a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.desc: White H2 could skip the whole process that hydrogen usually has to go through. You can just extract it from the ground and use it right away. White hydrogen forms when water and iron-rich rock reacts. It does not form reservoirs, but "flows up to the surface - in theory this could be seen as renewable as the formation process takes place in real time.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: Dave Kindig, KevDogg ja Will Lockwood muistelevat menneita ja ohjelman viimeisen kymmenen vuoden aikana tehtyja suurimpia rakennushankkeita.

programme.title: Miten kaikki tehdaan?
programme.desc: Kausi 16, osa 5. Nykymaailma on taynna monimutkaisia tuotanto- ja valmistusprosesseja. Nopeatahtisessa sarjassa juontajat Pat OBrien ja Dorothy Lucy avaavat eri alojen asiantuntijoiden kanssa, miten kaikki oikein tehdaan. (How Do They Do It?, dokumenttisarja, Kanada ja Iso-Britannia, 2019)

programme.title: Kullan sukeltajat: Jaan alla
programme.desc: Kaoottiset El Ninn aiheuttamat olosuhteet vaikuttavat jaahan, mika kaantaa kaivajien suunnitelmat paalaelleen ja osa joutuu lahtemaan kohteistaan.

programme.title: Kultakuume: Parkerin kultareitti
programme.desc: Kultakaivosten ihmelapsi Parker Schnabelin uusin aluevaltaus vie hanet kartoittamaan uusia mahdollisuuksia eksoottiseen eramaahan kauas Yukonista.

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Kauppahait tekevat kadonneen rahdin huutokaupassa tarjouksen Singerin ompelukoneesta ja henkilokohtaisten tavaroiden kokoelmasta. Kuka voittaa - syntyyko voittoa vai tappiota?

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Oletko koskaan miettinyt, mita kadonneille matkatavaroille tapahtuu? Harvinaislaatuinen kurkistus lunastamattomien matkatavaroiden huutokauppaan ja niiden edelleenmyyntiin.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike etsii isansa suosikkia, Ford Popularia, joka on kuuluisa vaihtelevasta laadustaan. Loytaako kaksikko yksilon, jossa on voiton kaarimisen mahdollisuus?

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike Brewer testaa markkinoita raataloidylla lava-autolla. Rouva Brewer laatii laajentumissuunnitelman. Tiimi entisoi 1980-luvun hot hatch -autoa.

programme.title: Alaska: Viimeinen rintama
programme.desc: Otto ja August ovat vaarallisella nostokurjenhakuretkella. Charlotte, Eivin ja Eve pelastavat lehmaa vuorovedesta. Atz Lee ja Jane lahtevat kajakeilla kalaan.

programme.title: Ruotsin rajavartijat
programme.desc: Rajatarkastajat pysayttavat rekan, joka saapuu Espanjasta, mita pidetaan korkean huumeriskin maana. Landvetteriin ilmestyy kilpikonna.

programme.title: Ruotsin rajavartijat
programme.desc: Trelleborgissa Stefan tarkistaa hermostuneen oloisen miehen, jolla on useita piilotettuja paketteja. Arlandassa norjalainen ei halua luovuttaa hasiksiaan.

programme.title: Baggage Battles

Mita sokkona ostetuista laukuista ja paketeista paljastuu? Kuka huutokauppakonkareista onnistuu huutamaan itselleen arvokkaimman sisallon?

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Tricia patsient sureb. Politsei avastab, et tegemist polnud toreda pensionariga, vaid terve rea nnestunud pangaroovide ettevalmistajaga. Nad leiavad keldri, kust roovlid kavatsesid tungida Ashfordly panka. Vernon teeb algust jarjekordse ariga, millest taas ei tule head nahka. Craddocki naine Penny tuleb ootamatult tagasi. Craddock saab ametikrgendust ja mistab, et ei suuda Pennyta elada.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Euroopa naarits suri Eestis valja juba 1990ndatel. Paarikumne aasta jooksul tehtud jupingutuste tulemusel on suudetud luua uus populatsioon Hiiumaale. Nuud puutakse Euroopa naaritsat asustada ka Saaremaa loodusesse. Kalapuuk jgede kallastel on meil populaarne hobi, kuid kummalisel kombel koguneb vaga palju prugi sinna, kus armastatakse loodust nautimas kaia. Uurime, kuidas mjutada inimeste kaitumist, et tulevikus oleks meie veekogud ja nende kaldad puhtamad. Martin Vesbergil nnestus jalgida sugisrandel peatuvaid valgepsk-laglesid. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Ridade vahel
programme.desc: Otepaa on nii talve- kui ka spordilinn, aga sealt on parit ka Mart Juur, kelle kohta vib oelda nii mndagi - ajakirjanik, diskor, humorist, luuletaja, rahva omakaitsja ja muidugi ennekike eesti kirjandusminister. Mart on tdenud, et hea nali peab millegi pealt tulema - naiteks silmaringi ja hariduse. Saates uuritakse, millised on Mardi huumori alustalad ja kui suurt rolli mangisid tema kujunemisel Otepaa, sealsed inimesed ja loetud raamatud. Saatejuht Ave-Marleen Rei, reissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Markiis survestab Pat Feliciano kohta ttt raakima. Teenijad asuvad Marat otsima. Leonor naaseb La Promesasse. Pelayo ja Jeronimo relvaaril laheb uha paremini.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Ilmari leiab Riinale ige diagnoosi. Jesse uritab Sonjat mjutada, kuid Sonja ei suuda ikka otsustada. Santeri satub piinlikku olukorda ning saab isalt peapesu. Leevi uritab Santerit lohutada ja temaga raakida, kuid Santeri trjub ta eemale.

programme.title: Estraadisangarid
programme.desc: Uno Loop on labi aegade olnud Eesti uks armastatuim laulja ja teda on kogu elu saatnud kuvand suurest sudametemurdjast. Kuid Loobi muusikuteed ei iseloomusta mitte pelgalt tuhanded kontserdid ja sajad solistina lauldud laulud, vaid ka mned tema enda poolt kirjutatud muusikaparlid. Loobi 1971. aastal loodud laulu "Kamina ees" peetakse Eesti esimeseks bossanoovaks. Jalgime, kuidas vanameistri ammune hitt labib enneolematu uuenduskuuri ja saab 21. sajandi varvilise kuue! Autorid Roald Johannson ja Jaak Kilmi.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Martin soovitab proua Mooreil kulmas vees ujumisest loobuda, kuni migreenide phjus on valja selgitatud. Proua Tichell viib ta kajakiga merele, kuid see laheb umber. Kulasse saabub taimedega ravija. Martin peab aitama patsiente, kes on saanud temalt valeravi, lisaks paastma ka tema enda elu. Penhale tahab Janicei valja kutsuda ja lpetab kalapedikuuri tegemisega.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Politseijaoskond ootab hinal uut seersanti. Endine kriminaalpolitseinik Dennis Merton on Craddocki taielik vastand. Kohalik kaabakas Ken Rogers palvib krgendatud tahelepanu. Ventress on sunnitud tegema Mertonile jahmatava ulestunnistuse oma mineviku kohta. Vernon puuab Davidit vormi ajada - ta hakkab poksimanederiks ja lpetab nokaudis.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Margna raagib Marele oma kummalisest unenaost, kuid Mare peab temas jalle pettuma. Laine on pahane, et Evelin koduproua ei taha olla, vaid endale tood otsib. Mornasse ilmub Are vana pinginaaber Mailis. Johannes ja Allan arutavad Euroopa Liiduga seonduvaid kusimusi. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Sonja lubab Jessele, et raagib viimaks Aleksile lahutusest. Leevi palub Lenitat, et Milla viks ooseks haiglasse jaada, kuid Lenita jaab endale kindlaks: haigla pole seksimiseks sobilik koht. Ilmari saab patsiendilt ullatava snumi.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Abel toob Jimena kohta uudiseid. Seersant Funes alustab Mara otsinguid. Margarital on Lorenzole ettepanek. Salvadoril on uuel tool raskusi.

programme.title: Impulss
programme.desc: Elulises arutelusaates naitame ilustamata lugusid Eesti elust, mis annavad tuke laiemaks diskussiooniks. Saatejuhid Anna Pihl ja Joosep Vark, toimetajad Nele-Mai Olup ja Sofia Suhhareva, reissoorid Keiti Valiste ja Salme-Riine Uibo, produtsent Mai Kangro.

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Reissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Madat omenat
programme.desc: Juhataja Parvilinna kulastab saart ja Onerva puuab tema jutule saada. Verale ja Onervale saab selgeks, et kedagi ei viida saarelt kodu kulastama. Vera nuab Lundstenilt selgitust. Verat suudistatakse kuuni suutamises.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: sja ilmunud raamatus "Rannakud valguse maastikel. Elu puudutusi" utlevad autorid, et elu phikusimustest saab korraga raakida ainult uhe vi vaga vaheste inimestega, sest inimene avaneb uksina. Kuidas ppida kuulama teist inimest? "Plekktrummi" kulaline on raamatu uks autoritest vaimulik ja hingehoidja Katri Aaslav-Tepandi. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma, toimetaja Katriin Lepik, reissoor Maire Radsin, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Kirjandusminister Mart Juure kulaliseks on folklorist, kultuuriloolane ja kirglik malumangusber Marju Kivupuu. 14. novembril on Marju Kivupuul 65. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

Ventress on sunnitud tegema Mertonile jahmatava ulestunnistuse oma mineviku kohta. Vernon puuab Davidit vormi ajada - ta hakkab poksimanederiks ja lpetab nokaudis.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Ints ja Mats klaarivad Annemaiga arveid. Anu kaib beebiga Maret hairimas. Jane ja Mari kurdavad Allanile, et neil on liiga palju lusitaania tigusid. Iiris ja Siim tahavad Are abi pulma korraldamisel.

programme.title: Eesti Telefilm. Senimaani
programme.desc: Paevil, kui Eesti Telefilm on virgumas letargiast, vaatame tagasi tema esimesele neljakumnele aastale, mil selle margi all sundis 900 filmi. Nii selliseid, mis jaavad Eesti kultuurilukku kuldsete sammastena kui ka saherdusi, millised tegijad ise sugavale unustusse mataksid. Autor Vahur Kersna, reissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Abel toob Jimena kohta uudiseid. Seersant Funes alustab Mara otsinguid. Margarital on Lorenzole ettepanek. Salvadoril on uuel tool raskusi.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Sonja lubab Jessele, et raagib viimaks Aleksile lahutusest. Leevi palub Lenitat, et Milla viks ooseks haiglasse jaada, kuid Lenita jaab endale kindlaks: haigla pole seksimiseks sobilik koht. Ilmari saab patsiendilt ullatava snumi.

programme.title: Maailm ja mnda
programme.desc: Uus ja erakordselt pnev saatesari maailmast, kus on veel mndagi avastada. Iga riik kuhu selles sarjas juame, on ainulaadne ja kordumatu. Esimeses saates oleme Hanois ja Halong Bay lahel. Valdur Mikital on mndagi selle kummalise loodusime kohta oelda. Isegi tai chi treeningu juab ta kruiisilaeval kaasa teha. Vietnami esimene ulikool on 1000 aastat vana ja seal kaivad lasteaia lapsed oma lpupidu pidamas. Ho Chi Minhi mausoleum Hanois ullatab sellega, et sarnaneb Lenini mausoleumile Moskvas. Omaette elamus on ppida selgeks, kuidas Vietnamis parleid kasvatatakse. Vietnamis filmisid Valdur Mikita, Tiina Park ja Marianne Krver. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Madat omenat
programme.desc: Juhataja Parvilinna kulastab saart ja Onerva puuab tema jutule saada. Verale ja Onervale saab selgeks, et kedagi ei viida saarelt kodu kulastama. Vera nuab Lundstenilt selgitust. Verat suudistatakse kuuni suutamises.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Kahe farmeripere ammune verivaen lahvatab taas ja ahvardab traagilise lpplahendusega, kui vaenule otsustavalt lppu ei tehta. Dora Allsop ja Arthur Wainwright, kes on teineteist kogu elu armastanud, kuid ei saanud perekondade vaenutsemise tttu abielluda, teevad sellele uhiselt lpu. Vernon Scripps ostab randkino ja hakkab filme naitama, kuid prkab kokku paljude takistustega.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Allan saab teada Jaanuse tookohast Tallinnas. lo paastab Riksi ja Anne-Mai suurest tulist ning selgitab Riksile sotsialismi ja kapitalismi erinevusi. Jane teatab Jaanusele oma Inglismaale sidust. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Sonja otsustab Aleksile viimaks ttt raakida, kuid Mikko kuuleb nende vestlust pealt ja laheb sellest paanikasse. Ira vaimustub Johanna ideedest ja teeb talle ettepaneku. Aino kohtub taas Kaiusega, kuid see kohtumine ei lahe nii, nagu Aino ootas.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Manuel sidab Jimenat kulastama. Pelayo kahtlustab Jeronimot Mara kadumises. Romulo kahetseb Salvadori edutamist. Simona avastab Valentni vale.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja pnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ning avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Reissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordispru. "Mati Alaver - valgusest varju" on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, reissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjarin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja reissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Euroopa Liidus vaieldakse rohereeglite lihtsustamise ule. Millise suuna vtab Euroopa kliimapoliika? Kui suure mjuga on jarjekorras 19 Venemaa vastane sanktsioonipakett? Millises seisus on USA ja Euroopa suhted? Euroopa Parlamendi stuudios vaitlevad Urmas Paet, Marina Kaljurand, Jana Toom, Riho Terras, Sven Mikser, Juri Ratas ja Jaak Madison. Saatejuht Andres Kuusk, reissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Monika
programme.desc: Pensionarist tippadvokaat Monika Magi ja filmimise hetkel oma prokurorikarjaari tipul oleva Steven-Hristo Evestuse argumenteeritud teotsingutele suunatud elavad vaidlused toimuvad valjaspool kohtusaali manguvaljakut ning samuti ka eluliste ja ajastuid hlmavate teemade ule. Peategelast iseloomustavad mitmed meie juriidilise maailma tipptegijad. Portreelugu valgustab ka kohtupidamise pnevaid ja inimlikke nuansse. Reissoorid Ken Saan ja Steven-Hristo Evestus, tootja Filmid ja Saapad. Filmi valmimist toetasid Eesti Rahvusringhaaling, Eesti Filmi Instituut ja Eesti Kultuurkapital.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Sel korral juavad Milderid Tai lahes asuvale Koh Phangani saarele, mis on kuulus oma legendaarsete taiskuupidude poolest, mida iseloomustavad neoonriietes pidutsejad ja ambritest joodav alkohol. Ka Piret, Egert ja Milli sukelduvad sellesse mollu. Lisaks tmmatakse katte poksikindad, et teha tutvust maailma surmavamaks vitluskunstiks peetava tai poksiga. Reissoor Egert Milder, toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder. Tootja Kaks Vulkaani.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Blue Jasmine
programme.desc: Jasmine viettaa yltakyllaista elamaa Manhattanilla averiaan miehensa paksun lompakon turvin. Eraana paivana kaikki romahtaa, ja murtunut Jasmine muuttaa vaatimattomasti elavan sisarensa Gingerin luo San Franciscoon. Jasmine yrittaa koota elamansa rippeet ja aloittaa alusta, mutta mita hanesta on jaljella ilman varakkaita kulisseja? Euroopasta kotimantereelleen palannut Woody Allen on tehnyt vahvasti puhuttelevan elokuvan petoksesta ja itsepetoksesta.

programme.title: Autohullut
programme.desc: K2 J1 Arttu Harkin ja stunttimestari Crazy Miken alias Mauri Uuskosken tahdittama kotimainen sarja, jossa testataan autojen myyntipuheiden paikkansapitavyytta. Jaksoissa vuorottelevat asiapitoinen autojen testaus ja stunttileikittely tahtivieraiden kanssa.

programme.title: Remppaa ja Sisusta

Innokkailla tekijoilla on jonkin verran taitoja, mutta sitakin suurempi halu tehda voittoa kauppaamalla remontoidut kohteet eteenpain.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Kupuseremonian yllattava lopputulos jarisyttaa paratiisia ja synnyttaa uusia jakolinjoja. Pudonneet asukkaat palaavat hiillostamaan kilpailijoita ja aanestamaan siita, kuka ansaitsee istumapaikan viimeiseen pariseremoniaan.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Tuoreiden mokkeilijoiden omistaman merenrantamokin piha kaipaa selkeytta. Mokkielaman vaaroja pelkaava perhe haluaa pihaan puisia kulkuja, terassin ja oleskelualueen. Tanja ja Niko saapuvat hatiin ja pihasta tehdaan kolmessa tasossa toimiva kesaparatiisi, jossa on mm. kesakeittio, useita oleskelualueita seka upeat puiset kulut.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Viimeisen pariseremonian alla ratkotaan viimeiset tuolit. Pudonneiden aanestyksen jalkeen jarjestetaan viela uhriseremonia. Lopulta finaaliparit ovat selvilla.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Finaalipaivan aluksi muistellaan mennytta taivalta. Vanhat kilpailijat aanestavat voittajaparin, ja illalla selviaa, miten puolen miljoonan kruunun palkintopotti jaetaan.

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 22/25. Maustematkailua. Mary vie meidat matkalle mausteiden maailmaan! Han nayttaa, miten voit kayttaa maustekaappiin jaaneita purkkeja ihanalla tavalla. Tanaan Mary valmistaa tunisialaisia harissakatkarapuja, korealaisella gochujangilla maustettuja pihveja, pitaleipia ja lopuksi viela ihania omatekoisia mausteseoksia. Kanadalainen ruokareality.

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Aamu alkaa Korkeasaaren portilla varhain. David vastailee Villielainsairaalan puhelimeen, ja Pelastuslaitoksen elainpelastusyksikko kuljettaa hoitoon uusia potilaita. Persianlammaskaritsat ovat muuttaneet yhteen afrikanpikkuvuohien kanssa.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Burgerimiesten Italian valloitus alkaa erittain tyhjentavalla viinitilavierailulla Pohjois-Italian Piemontessa. Tryffelikassit heiluvat iloisesti Alban vuorilla, ja Parmassa kiskotaan kinkkua ja parmesaania.

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Juontajat pureutuvat suomalaisten suosikkiaiheeseen, autoverotukseen, ja esittelevat kaikkien aikojen nerokkaimmat keinot sen kiertamiseen. Teemu Selanne selvittaa, mika on todellista luksusta, apunaan huippuvarusteltu Bentley Flying Spur ja Stig. Studiossa vieraana JVG:n Jare Brand.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Kausi 14. Jakso 1/18. Lojaliteettikysymyksia. Jamie on peitetyossa ihmiskaupparingissa. Danny joutuu pohtimaan, miten pitkalle vanhaa ystavaa voi auttaa. Frank taiteilee julkisuuskuvansa kanssa. Amerikkalainen draamasarja.

programme.title: Alaskan jaalentokentta
programme.desc: Anchoragessa lumipeite vaarantaa joulujuhlat kuplahallissa, ja apuun tarvitaan helikopteria. Syrjaiseen Crooked Creekin kylaan lennatetaan juomavetta, ja Anchoragen kentalla tulee lastattavaksi tonnien painoinen rajahdelasti.

programme.title: Arman Pohjantahden alla
programme.desc: Illan dokumentissa Arman vierailee Suviseuroissa ja oppii synnin seka anteeksiannon merkityksen lestadiolaisuudessa. Millaisia uhrauksia he ovat valmiita tekemaan uskonsa eteen ja mita se heille antaa? Millaista on erota tai kritisoida yhteisoa mihin on kasvanut?

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Viimeisen pariseremonian alla ratkotaan viimeiset tuolit. Pudonneiden aanestyksen jalkeen jarjestetaan viela uhriseremonia. Lopulta finaaliparit ovat selvilla.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Finaalipaivan aluksi muistellaan mennytta taivalta. Vanhat kilpailijat aanestavat voittajaparin, ja illalla selviaa, miten puolen miljoonan kruunun palkintopotti jaetaan.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Valkeakoskella sijaitsee vuonna 1901 rakennettu kesapaikka, jonka entinen renginhuone halutaan muuttaa perheen kolmen tyttaren kesahuoneeksi. Mikko ja Ville muokkaavat tapettien ja varien avulla huoneesta varikyllaisen kokonaisuuden, jonne tuodaan lisaksi seinanlevyinen kerrossanky. Myos vanhemmat saavat osansa yllatyksesta, kun keskenerainen wc-tila uudistetaan satumaisen kauniiksi kokonaisuudeksi.

programme.title: Lego Masters Suomi
programme.desc: Millaisia teoksia syntyy sadan metrin syvyydessa? Tehtavana on herattaa rakennelmat eloon valon ja varjojen avulla. Yksi rakentajapari joutuu jattamaan kisan.

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 23/25. Syotavaa sihtikurkuille. Mary auttaa nirsoista laheisista karsivia helpoilla ja kaikille maistuvilla resepteilla. Han valmistaa herkullisia suklaamuffineja kesakurpitsan kera, muokattavaa perunasoselaatikkoa, kotitekoista ketsuppia ja ihanaa rapeaa kanaa kahteen tapaan. Kanadalainen ruokareality.

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Kausi 2. Jakso 7/8. Elaintenhoitaja Susanin paivaan kuuluu naataelainten koulutusta seka korppien ja karhujen hoitamista. Elaimet saavat helleherkkuja ja Marjut viilentaa myskiharkien tallia vedella. Meripelastusseura kyyditsee jalleen kuutteja ulkosaaristoon. Kotimainen elainohjelma.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Burgerimiehet etenevat Italiassa Toscanaan asti. Vastaan osuu pikkuisen paksumpaa pihvia, maailman parasta jaateloa, tilallinen viinia, lasagne-koulu ja annos nykytaidetta Ferrari-museossa.

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Suomen eniten myyty automerkki on Toyota, mutta mika myy kaikkein vahiten? Juontajat saavat haasteekseen hankkia maan vahiten myydyt automallit ja selvittaa perin pohjin, miksi ne eivat kay kaupaksi. Christoffer seka ihastuu etta vihastuu salamannopeaan Maseratin uutuusmalliin. Vieraana Porsche-fani ja julkkiskokki Henri Alen.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Kausi 14. Jakso 2/18. Ikavia yllatyksia. Danny saa lahetyksen, joka johtaa jalleen sarjamurhaajan kannoille. Pidatetty nainen tekee ilmoituksen raiskauksesta. Joe tormaa Jamieen huumeratsiassa, ja pormestari yllattaa Frankin taysin. Amerikkalainen draamasarja.

programme.title: Alaskan jaalentokentta
programme.desc: Matkustajakone tyhjennetaan Anchoragessa oudon hajun vuoksi, Fairbanksin lentokentalla taistellaan lunta vastaan, ja Eielsonin lentotukikohdassa harjoitellaan F-35-havittajien ilmatankkausta

programme.title: Arman Pohjantahden alla
programme.desc: Metsastys on ollut merkittava elinkeino ja valttamaton osa suomalaisten ruuan saantia, millainen on metsastyskulttuuri nykyaan ja miksi sita harrastetaan? Illan ohjelmassa lahdetaan hirvimetsalle ja fasaanijahtiin, missa Arman paasee kokemaan luonnon rauhan ja milta tuntuu ampua oma ruokansa.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Tanska
programme.desc: Kausi 17. Jakso 1/39. Asukkaat kayvat taloksi. Hotelliin muuttavat uudet asukkaat. Parit jaetaan sattumanvaraisesti pelikorttien avulla. Joillakin pareilla menee loistavasti, mutta kaikkien valilla ei synkkaa. Tanskalainen sarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Tanska
programme.desc: Kausi 17. Jakso 2/39. Isoveli. Aamulla hotelliin astelee asukas, joka osoittautuu vanhan asukkaan isoveljeksi. Uusi asukas tuo mukanaan tehtavan. Muut ihmettelevat erasta toista asukasta, joka bilettamisen sijaan puhuu taktiikasta eika lahde uuden asukkaan esittelykierrokselle. Tanskalainen sarja.

programme.title: Barnets hjarta
programme.desc: terstallande. Det ar inte alltid s latt att forst saker som man kunde tro. Hur kan man ratta till sitt tankande nar det galler att handskas med barnen?

programme.title: En hjord, en herde
programme.desc: Fralsningens fyra brunnar. Fralsningens fyra brunnar symboliserar Guds verk, Guds flock och det andliga arbetets tillstnd. Benjamin Turkia undervisar.

programme.title: Salaam Aleikum
programme.desc: Guds enhet. Forstelsen av Guds enhet kan fordjupas med hebreiska termer. Den fore detta muslimen Yasser Andraus och den messianske rabbinen Jason Sobel diskuterar denna sak.

programme.title: Tillsammans ber vi LIVE
programme.desc: Direktsant forbonsprogram med roterande team och med fokus p olika teman varje gng. Forvanta dig en kvall med undervisning, vittnesbord, forbon och lovsng i den Helige Andes narvaro.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Kungen kommer
programme.desc: Juda - lejonet av Juda. Har du ngonsin undrat over varfor Uppenbarelseboken talar om Jesus bde som Guds offerlamm och som lejonet av Juda stam? Varfor ar det just lejonet som fr oppna bokrullen och dess sju sigill? Upp 5:5

programme.title: Pilgrim Media
programme.desc: Guds nd. Dario Gjorushevski talar om varldens basta budskap - Guds nd.

programme.desc: Landet fylls av tack. Under boneresan till byn Burqin tackar och lovar vi Gud for den spetalske man som vande tillbaka for att tacka. Har finns nu en plats dar man an idag forkunnar Jesu seger.

programme.title: Pawson
